%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] � %c[ui_gray_2] 12.7x55mm calibre weapons
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Suppressor for the ASH-12.
 
%c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]medium
A special upgrade pack that includes a SpecterDR, Trijicon RMR and an ANPEQ15 LAM. This combination provides the user long and close range sights and the aid of the ANPEQ15 for hip fire aiming aid.
A special upgrade pack that includes a SpecterDR and a Trijicon RMR. This combination provides the user long and close range sights for fire aiming aid.

%c[ui_gray_1]SilencerCO Salvo 12 suppressor.
 
%c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]medium
